title: Watch: Nautic – Fresh Eyes (Live At Boiler Room)
content:
Weekends so often spread into weekdays don’t they? This goes to some lengths to explain our absence yesterday.

We start today however with a Boiler Room recording of CitR faves Nautic tearing it up at the Young Turks take over last week. It’s a spine tingling rendition of their debut single, Fresh Eyes. Plus our boy Slime is centre shot. What’s not to love?
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
